divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed an extremely bright white light motionless in the sky. I could see the stars and was very dark out in the middle of springfield mass. This was actually the 2nd time I saw the light but only took pictures one time because I didn't have my cell phone the other morning at the same location. I was surprised when I downloaded the picture and the single white light was no longer there and was replaced by 3 glowing red lights in a triangluar form. I am a mechanical engineer by trade a recieved a bachelors degree from wentworth institute of technology. The pictures can be tested and will prove to be authentic. Please let me know if you have any questions. I have a total of 4 pictures and you must zoom in to see the 3 red lights in a triangle. I will attach 2 original pictures and 1 with all 4 of the images blown up.
Summary: While driving to work one early morning I saw a bright light in the sky and took a picture with my cell phone.
